title: A Statistical Performance Analysis of Graph Clustering Algorithms
venue: Workshop on Algorithms and Models for the Web-Graph

tldr.text: Three statistical measures are introduced that are robust, immune to resolution limit, easy to intuitively interpret and also have a formal statistical interpretation and are shown to be more responsive to graph structure, less sensitive to sample size and breakdowns during numerical implementation and lesssensitive to uncertainty in connectivity.
